frontmatter.title: watsonx
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion makes it fast to get a resilient deployment of watsonx up and running in your data center.

internal.content:
---
title: watsonx
description: IBM Fusion makes it fast to get a resilient deployment of watsonx up and running in your data center.
tabs: [Overview, Resources]
---

<PageDescription>

More ways to explore

</PageDescription>

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink>Articles and blogs</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Videos</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>

## Articles and blogs

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Reference architecture"
      title="Learn how to configure a custom solution for deploying watsonx.data on bare metal with storage acceleration"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://github.com/IBM/storage-fusion/blob/master/reference-architectures/fusion-sds-with-watsonx-data.md"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Redpaper"
      title="Read the Redpaper on configuring storage acceleration on Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://www.redbooks.ibm.com/abstracts/redp5720.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Learn how Fusion HCI and the NVIDIA A100 power AI workloads"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2023/12/fusion-hci-performance-boost-for-ai-apps.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

## Videos

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Generative AI and machine learning with IBM watsonx.ai"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://mediacenter.ibm.com/media/DemoA+Generative+AI+and+machine+learning+with+IBM+watsonx.ai/1_q0wsldb3"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.ai](/images/ai.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Get started with watsonx.data"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://mediacenter.ibm.com/media/watsonx.data+demoA+Get+started+with+watsonx.data/1_brvv64az"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.data](/images/data_thumb.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Model monitoring with watsonx.governance"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://mediacenter.ibm.com/media/Model+monitoring+with+IBM+watsonx.governance/1_5fo64zn4"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.governance](/images/gov.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Learn about watsonx.data query acceleration"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://mediacenter.ibm.com/media/IBM+watsonx.data+together+with+IBM+Storage+Fusion+HCI+System/1_mh31qcuc"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![How query acceleration works](/images/query-accel-explained.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="IBM Fellow Vincent Hsu discusses how storage acceleration works"
  subTitle="Interview"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWY-pVB0b-I&t=1s&pp=ygUOZnVzaW9uIHdhdHNvbng%3D"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Interview with Vincent Hsu](/images/vincent-interview.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="watsonx.data product manager Josh Kim discusses the advantages of Fusion HCI"
  subTitle="Interview"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aZmab_SWIZc"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Interview with Josh Kim](/images/kim-interview.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Learn how storage acceleration works"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tjxY9mZPJGE"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Query acceleration](/images/how-query-acceleration-works.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Watch how backup and restore for watsonx.data works"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rCMLB0mgYiI"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![watsonx.data backup](/images/watsonx-backup.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

frontmatter.title: watsonx
